sentences.sContent: Would you rather be an alchemist or a chemist?
sentences.sContent_eng: Would you rather be an alchemist or a chemist?
sentences.sCn: 那么，你想做一个炼金术士，还是一个化学家呢？

sentences.sContent: Our industrialists are transforming sand and oil into ever smaller and more intricate machines, a form of alchemy more wondrous than anything any alchemist ever dreamed of.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our industrialists are transforming sand and oil into ever smaller and more intricate machines, a form of alchemy more wondrous than anything any alchemist ever dreamed of.
sentences.sCn: 工业家正在将沙和石油转化为更为小巧、更为复杂的机器，这是一种连历史中的炼金术士做梦都无法想到的魔法。

remMethod.val: al + chemist(化学家) → 炼金术士

trans.tranOther: An alchemist was a scientist in the Middle Ages who tried to discover how to change ordinary metals into gold
